name: ethanol, from fermentation, to market for ethanol, vehicle grade | ethanol, without water, in 99.7% solution state, from fermentation, vehicle grade | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6003/documentation

This activity links the output of the generic market for ethanol, without water, in 99.7% solution state, from fermentation to the niche market for ethanol, without water, in 99.7% solution state, from fermentation, at service station. ;The niche market provides ethanol for petrol production. 

Activity starting with the input of ethanol, without water, in 99.7% solution state, from fermentation

Activity ends with the provision of ethanol, without water, in 99.7% solution state, from fermentation, at service station
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
